medi:segment.description: To indicate the type and function of a messageand to transmit the identifying number.

medi:field.medi:documentation: DOCUMENT/MESSAGE NAME - Identification of a type of document/message by codeor name. Code preferred.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Document name code - Code specifying the document name.
Code list identification code - Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code list responsible agency code - Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Document name - Name of a document.

medi:field.medi:documentation: DOCUMENT/MESSAGE IDENTIFICATION - Identification of a document/message by its numberand eventually its version or revision.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Document identifier - To identify a document.
Version identifier - To identify a version.
Revision identifier - To identify a revision.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Message function code - Code indicating the function of the message.
Response type code - Code specifying the type of acknowledgment required ortransmitted.
